name: From the outside looking in
description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

key_work.title: Evolver
key_work.credit_line:
United Kingdom, 2022

Marshmallow Laser Feast

An Atlas V, Pressman Film and Marshmallow Laser Feast Production

In association with Dirty Films
key_work.brief_description:
Marshmallow Laser Feast’s Evolver is a virtual reality experience that drops audiences deep inside the landscape of the body, following the flow of oxygen through our branching ecosystem to its origin – a single ‘breathing’ cell among trillions within our body. This deep dive takes viewers through the processes that sustain all life, as air travels from the mouth into the lungs, whirling like a tornado, before circulating around the complex rivers and tributaries of our cardiovascular system. As this life force reaches the outer extremities, from the billowing synapses of the brain to our fingers and toes, the interior blooms into a forest of branching pathways, suffused by a fog of life-bringing oxygen. Through this transcendental narrative, it becomes clear that breath not only sparks life, but also connects us to the natural world through the cycle of respiration.

At ACMI, Evolver is presented in its original VR form and as three individual moments, including a collective meditation experience and awe-inspiring, large-scale projections.

Executive produced by Edward R. Pressman and Terrence Malick, and alongside the French studio Atlas V, the experience features voice over by Cate Blanchett and music by Jonny Greenwood, Meredith Monk, Jóhann Jóhannsson, Howard Skempton and Jon Hopkins. EVOLVER is supported by Nicole Shanahan of Bia-Echo Foundation and Orange, and informed through scientific collaborations with the Fraunhofer Institute for Digital Medicine MEVIS, the Allen Institute for Cell Science and the Buck Institute for Research on Aging.
The work was developed in partnership with world renowned creatives including visual artist Natan Sinigaglia, Director of Sound James Bulley, spatial sound artist Henrik Oppermann, and the esteemed writer and poet Daisy Lafarge.

constellations_primary.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_primary.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

start.title: Fantastic Voyage
start.creator_credit: Richard Fleischer, William B. Murphy, Saul David, 20th Century Fox, Harry Kleiner, Jerome Bixby and Otto Klement
start.brief_description: In order to save an assassinated scientist, a submarine and its crew are shrunk to microscopic size and injected into his bloodstream.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

end.title: Rick and Morty
end.creator_credit: Albro Lundy IV, Anne Lane, J. Michael Mendel, Lee Harting, Nick Rutherford, Steve Levy, Sydney Ryan, Green Portal Productions, Harmonius Claptrap, Justin Roiland's Solo Vanity Card Productions, Starburns Industries and Williams Street
end.brief_description: Rick is a mentally-unbalanced but scientifically gifted old man who has recently reconnected with his family. He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty’s already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

links.description: In a parody of the 1966 classic, Morty is likewise injected into homeless man Reuben’s body and tasked with saving him. Morty must fight several deadly diseases, escaped from their enclosures in Anatomy Park before its too late.

start.title: Inside Out
start.creator_credit: Pete Docter, Ronnie del Carmen, Jonas Rivera, Pixar, Walt Disney Pictures, Ralph Eggleston, Josh Cooley, Meg LeFauve and Andrew Jimenez

video_links.name: INSIDE OUT | Trailer 2 - UK | Official Disney UK
INSIDE OUT | New UK Trailer | Official Disney UK

start.brief_description: Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it’s no exception for Riley, who is uprooted from her Midwest life when her father starts a new job in San Francisco. Riley’s guiding emotions— Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness—live in Headquarters, the control centre inside Riley’s mind, where they help advise her through everyday life and tries to keep things positive, but the emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house and school.

constellations_other.name: Unpacking: domestic intimacy and the coming-of-age film
constellations_other.description: Many screen-based narratives focus on packing up and moving house, new starts and teenage bedrooms, or are entirely shot in one room, revealing what we can learn about characters from a domestic environment.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

constellations_other.name: Houses that move us
constellations_other.description: Our homes are important to us. When they’re good, they’re our havens. If that home changes, or things go wrong, it can affect us very deeply. This constellation looks at the different ways directors and game devs have positioned the home onscreen - from sanctuary, to hostile enemy.

end.title: Paprika
end.creator_credit: Satoshi Kon, Takeshi Seyama, Yumi Jinguji, Jungo Maruta, Masao Takiyama, Madhouse and Seishi Minakami
end.brief_description: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patient’s dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist can stop it: Paprika.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

links.description: The DC Mini allows Doctor Atsuko Chiba to access her patients dreams, helping them as a dream detective to address mental health issues. But in the wrong hands, it can cause nightmarish phycological damage. Only Paprika can save us from the dream terrorists attacking our minds.

start.title: Rick and Morty
start.creator_credit: Albro Lundy IV, Anne Lane, J. Michael Mendel, Lee Harting, Nick Rutherford, Steve Levy, Sydney Ryan, Green Portal Productions, Harmonius Claptrap, Justin Roiland's Solo Vanity Card Productions, Starburns Industries and Williams Street
start.brief_description: Rick is a mentally-unbalanced but scientifically gifted old man who has recently reconnected with his family. He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty’s already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

end.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
end.brief_description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time reveals the genesis of the fantasy land of Hyrule, the origin of the Triforce, and the tale of the first exploits of Princess Zelda and the heroic adventurer Link. Vibrant, real-time 3-D graphics transport you into the fantasy world of Hyrule. Your quest takes you through dense forests and across wind-whipped deserts. Swim raging rivers, climb treacherous mountains, dash on horseback across rolling hills, and delve into dungeons full of creatures that fight to the finish to put an end to your adventures. With immersive graphics, a sweeping story line, swashbuckling adventure, mind-bending puzzles, and a touch of humor, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time is one of Nintendo’s most epic challenges ever.

constellations_other.name: What's in a name?
constellations_other.description: Pakeezah (1972) star Meena Kumari was not just 'the tragedy queen' of Hindi film – she also wrote poetry under the pseudonym Naaz. From famous families and stage names to gendered disguises, this Constellation explores how women have adopted different names and identities to facilitate their ambition.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

links.description: Zelda must also face internal belly beasts. This time however it is inside the belly of Lord Jabu-Jabu who has been rather grumpy because of nasty parasites taking refuge inside his insides. Defeat the boss mega-parasite and save the Princess!

start.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
start.brief_description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time reveals the genesis of the fantasy land of Hyrule, the origin of the Triforce, and the tale of the first exploits of Princess Zelda and the heroic adventurer Link. Vibrant, real-time 3-D graphics transport you into the fantasy world of Hyrule. Your quest takes you through dense forests and across wind-whipped deserts. Swim raging rivers, climb treacherous mountains, dash on horseback across rolling hills, and delve into dungeons full of creatures that fight to the finish to put an end to your adventures. With immersive graphics, a sweeping story line, swashbuckling adventure, mind-bending puzzles, and a touch of humor, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time is one of Nintendo’s most epic challenges ever.

Riley’s guiding emotions— Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness—live in Headquarters, the control centre inside Riley’s mind, where they help advise her through everyday life and tries to keep things positive, but the emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house and school.

constellations_other.name: Houses that move us
constellations_other.description: Our homes are important to us. When they’re good, they’re our havens. If that home changes, or things go wrong, it can affect us very deeply. This constellation looks at the different ways directors and game devs have positioned the home onscreen - from sanctuary, to hostile enemy.

links.description: Instead of traversing the body, Inside Out journeys into the mind, where we see the five emotions of Riley as they try to navigate her family’s relocation to a new city. Needing to work together, Happy, Sadness, Anger, Fear and Disgust learn that complex memories are far more than one emotion alone.

constellations_other.name: From the outside looking in
constellations_other.description: In Marshmallow Laser Feast's Evolver, we journey inside the human body, inhaled through the lungs and swept throughout the cells with breath. Across screen culture, many narratives similarly explore what's under our skin.

links.description: To save Dr. Jan Benes from a life-threatening blood clot in his brain, a submarine crew is shrunk down to the size of a microbe and injected into his body. They must save Benes in 60 minutes before they resize and risk killing him.
